resources.string:

Product ID: 190199246980

Package height: 4.2 cm
Package Width1: 1.4 cm
Item EAN: 2725603995420
Color: White
Noise Cancelling: YES

Block the outside world and dive deep into your music with the Apple AirPods Pro. They sport a unique white color that is certain to turn many heads. With three sizes of flexible silicone tips to choose from, the Apple wireless headphones offer a customizable fit. Plus, the internal taper of these headphones matches your ears shape for a secure fit and noise cancellation. The custom-built, high excursion, low-distortion drivers of the Apple Bluetooth headphones are responsible for delivering powerful bass. Similarly, to extend battery life and produce vibrant, clear and crisp sound, the AirPods Pro incorporate a high dynamic range amplifier. Owing to the incredible active noise cancellation of the AirPods Pro, you can enjoy a delightful experience listening to music, podcasts and anything else with the outside sound blocked. Similarly, for keeping you in touch with the surrounding, the AirPods Pro headphones features a transparency mode. The Apple headphones have excellent resistance against water and sweat, which means they can endure accidental water spills and splashes. Plus, these headphones have an impressive battery life that offers up to 4.5 hours of listening time and 3.5 hours of talk time with one-hour charging.
